name: BetterPic
description: BetterPic uses AI to transform casual photos into professional 4K headshots for business and personal use.
longDescription: BetterPic is an AI-powered platform designed to create studio-quality 4K professional headshots from casual selfies or photos, eliminating the need for expensive and time-consuming traditional photoshoots. Its mission is to provide affordable, high-quality, and customizable imagery for professionals, businesses, and individuals to enhance their online presence on platforms like LinkedIn, resumes, or marketing materials. Users upload 6-9 photos, select from over 150 styles and backgrounds, and receive hundreds of polished headshots in under an hour. The platform emphasizes ease of use, data privacy, and a money-back guarantee to ensure customer satisfaction. It caters to a wide range of users, including freelancers, enterprises, and startups, by offering integrations with HR tools and a user-friendly AI assistant for photo uploads. BetterPic's innovative approach makes professional imagery accessible and cost-effective, saving users up to 20 times the cost of a traditional photoshoot.
features: AI-driven headshot generation transforms 6-9 casual photos into professional 4K headshots in under an hour, saving time and cost.
Over 150 customizable styles and backgrounds allow users to tailor headshots for specific use cases like LinkedIn or corporate branding.
AI upload assistant analyzes and grades photos to ensure optimal quality and results for generated headshots.
Manual photo editing service enables users to request touch-ups for $8 per edit, enhancing specific features like clothing or facial appearance.
Redo option at $10 per request allows users to generate new headshots if initial results are unsatisfactory, ensuring flexibility.
Full commercial license included with each package supports use in marketing materials, business cards, and online platforms.
Integrations with HR tools like BambooHR and Microsoft Dynamics 365 streamline headshot use for team profiles.
7-day refund policy provides a risk-free experience if users are not satisfied with their AI-generated headshots.

faqs.question: How does BetterPic generate professional headshots?
faqs.answer: Users upload 6-9 casual photos, select styles and backgrounds, and BetterPic’s AI processes them into 4K professional headshots in under an hour.

faqs.question: What types of photos can I upload to BetterPic?
faqs.answer: You can upload images in JPEG, JPG, PNG, AVIF, GIF, TIFF, and WebP formats, but avoid patterned clothing or group photos for best results.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available for BetterPic?
faqs.answer: Yes, BetterPic offers a free AI headshot generator, but it may involve a wait time of 2-3 months due to high demand.

faqs.question: Can I edit my AI-generated headshots?
faqs.answer: Yes, manual edits can be requested for $8 each to fix issues like clothing errors or facial imperfections, typically completed in 24-48 hours.

faqs.question: What if I’m not satisfied with my headshots?
faqs.answer: You can request a redo for $10, allowing a new set of headshots to be generated with the same or new photos.

faqs.question: What platforms does BetterPic integrate with?
faqs.answer: BetterPic integrates with HR tools like ADP Enterprise HR, BambooHR, HiBob, and Microsoft Dynamics 365 for seamless team profile management.

faqs.question: How long does it take to receive my headshots?
faqs.answer: Most plans deliver headshots in under an hour, though the Basic plan may take up to two hours.

faqs.question: Does BetterPic offer a refund policy?
faqs.answer: Yes, BetterPic provides a 7-day refund policy if you are not satisfied with your AI-generated headshots.
